## PageTemplate class

Represents a Page Template: a template used to render a Page.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class PageTemplate extends Template
```

**Extends:** [Template](./models.template.md)

When set, component presentation(s) and region(s) of page using this page template will be validated against this schema, along with its Metadata instead of the Metadata schema of the page. |
